mapper.select: select count(id) from member where id=#{id}

select m.name, g.reg_date as regDate, g.deadline, p.pt_count as ptCount, t.name as trainerName, m.locker_no as lockerNo from member m left join general g on m.no = g.no left join pt p on m.no = p.no left join trainer t on p.trainer_no = t.trainer_no where m.no = #{no}
